de.tud.android.locpairs
Class InRoundPlayingActivity

java.lang.Object
  MapActivity
      de.tud.android.locpairs.InRoundPlayingActivity

public class InRoundPlayingActivity
extends MapActivity

InRoundPlayingActivity handles the actions in the active game. You see the players on the map, the card positions, the active team. There is a count down, the points of your team and scanned cards will be displayed.

Nested Class Summary

          Handles the touch event for the goThere action so that the room is highlighted.
